title: Goldsmith - The Omen III Final Conflict (Original Soundtrack)
description:
This is Jerry Goldsmith's symphonic score from the 1981 film OMEN III: THE FINAL CONFLICT. 

This torrent was previously released on piratebay as http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/4692413/Omen_3__The_Final_Conflict__Deluxe_Edition__movie_soundtrack_WAV.  However, the original torrent consisted of uncompressed WAV files totalling nearly 700MB, and is barely being seeded any longer. Because of the importance of this score to Goldsmith fans, and with full credit to the original torrent author, I have encoded the files using Fraunhoffer MP3PRO VBR 100 (for highest MP3 quality) for a new total of just under 50MB. 

Enjoy!
